text:
The log4j.dtd file does not appear to be available anywhere on the development
site. The link from the javadoc,
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/api/org/apache/log4j/xml/doc-files/log4j.dtd
is broken.
creator: kris.nuttycombe@noaa.gov
mprice@atl.lmco.com
